name: Sunshine & Overcast
description:
(NOTE: This title has been temporarily delayed until after I release my other visual novel on Steam.)

Sunshine & Overcast is a visual novel.

You will roleplay as a character in the story and sometimes will be able to choose an action or a dialogue response for that character.

On each page you will have one to four choices. You may only make one choice each time through the story.

Some choices may change the flow of the story. Other choices are used to determine which ending you unlock. All choices matter!

There are multiple endings, so be sure to try again after you've completed the story!
